attributes.action: More funding to the decaying Police Force
attributes.additional_details: Police stations have been closing. Response times longer. Police patrols more scarce. It is time for the government to take action.
attributes.background: Crime has been steadily rising since the 2015 police cuts, and it is time to put more funding into the police force, and put the safety of the people first! Now, as we head into winter, crime will rise! Lets call the government to put more funding into the police force.
